responsibilities: Coordinate with research staff to ensure research activities comply with federal, state, and institutional review board regulations.
Maintain and assist with the preparation of IRB protocols and regulatory documents.
Aid with research subject recruitment and consent.
Compile medical record information into an anonymized database.
Perform ex vivo mechanical testing and phantom-based validation studies.
Assist in the collection of physiologic, ultrasound, and MRI data in healthy adults, children, and patients with chronic illnesses.
Write basic software (MATLAB, Python) to analyze and report medical imaging data.
Write up and present findings at national and international scientific journals and venues.
skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
Ability to be organized and work independently.
Ability to maintain maturity and professionalism when working with vulnerable patient populations.
analysis: The job responsibilities primarily involve coordinating research activities, maintaining regulatory documents, recruiting research subjects, compiling medical records, performing mechanical testing, collecting physiological data, and writing software for data analysis. The skills required include proficiency in MATLAB and Python, communication skills, organizational skills, and professionalism. There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is on medical imaging data analysis and research compliance, which does not inherently involve GenAI or LLMs.
